About Me

Hello, my name is Daniel and I am high school student from Poland.
Since I remember I've been always fascinated by electronics, computers and math.

I almost every bit of my free time programming - I mainly do it in C, C++, Python and some Bash. You can check some of projects on my github or my git repo on this site.

I also discovered my passion for Unix-like OS's. My daily driver distro is Arch, but I also use Ubuntu and Debian on other devices every day.

Ofc, I have some Thinkpads :)

I'm currently working on a simple and modular Wayland Compositor which will be a great and compatibility with other devices.

Interests

  • Software programming for Linux
  • Raspberry PI
  • Old hardware
  • Programming
  • r/unixporn
  • Arduino
  • Linux
  • Anime
